original_title: Close associate of “Heenatiyana Mehesh” arrested with firearm and ammo
original_body_lines: A close associate of the notorious underworld figure “Heenatiyana Mahesh” has been arrested during a raid conducted amidst the ongoing ‘Yukthiya’ operation.
According to reports, the suspect had been orchestrating the murder of two businesspersons on a contract.
The officers of Katunayake Police found 5 rounds of 9mm live ammunition on the suspect at the time of the arrest.
Upon further interrogating the arrestee, the investigating officers managed to recover a pistol and more rounds of live ammunition.
